name: pm-planning-system
goal: Add PM planning system: resources/plans with quarter and week planning, templates, four skills (quarter-plan, goals-alignment, week-plan, week-review), and documentation so arete update delivers the feature.

userStories.title: Add planning dirs and default files to workspace structure
userStories.description: In src/core/workspace-structure.ts: (1) Add 'resources/plans', 'resources/plans/archive', and 'templates/plans' to WORKSPACE_DIRS. (2) Add to DEFAULT_FILES: resources/plans/README.md (describe planning hierarchy: quarter then week then daily later; file naming quarter-YYYY-Qn.md and week-YYYY-Www.md; org strategy in context/goals-strategy.md), templates/plans/quarter-goals.md (structure: quarter dates, 3-5 outcomes with success criteria and org pillar/OKR link, alignment table), templates/plans/week-priorities.md (structure: week dates, top 3-5 outcomes with quarter goal links, commitments due, carried over). In test/core/workspace-structure.test.ts: add one test that WORKSPACE_DIRS includes 'resources/plans' and 'resources/plans/archive'; add one test that DEFAULT_FILES includes 'resources/plans/README.md' and content includes 'Planning' or 'quarter'.
acceptanceCriteria: WORKSPACE_DIRS includes resources/plans, resources/plans/archive, templates/plans
DEFAULT_FILES includes resources/plans/README.md, templates/plans/quarter-goals.md, templates/plans/week-priorities.md
Test file asserts new dirs and plans README
npm run typecheck passes
npm test passes

userStories.title: Create quarter-plan skill
userStories.description: Create .cursor/skills/quarter-plan/SKILL.md. Follow Agent Skills format (name, description in frontmatter). When to Use: set quarter goals, plan quarter, align to org. Workflow: read context/goals-strategy.md and last quarter file if any; guide PM to 3-5 outcomes; for each outcome capture success criteria and link to org pillar/OKR; write resources/plans/quarter-YYYY-Qn.md using template structure; include alignment table (My goal -> Org pillar/OKR). Reference projects/active/pm-planning-system-prd/outputs/prd-pm-planning-system.md for details.
acceptanceCriteria: File exists at .cursor/skills/quarter-plan/SKILL.md
Contains When to Use and Workflow sections
References goals-strategy.md and quarter file output
npm run typecheck and npm test pass

userStories.title: Create goals-alignment skill
userStories.description: Create .cursor/skills/goals-alignment/SKILL.md. When to Use: view goals, compare to org, roll up. Workflow: read context/goals-strategy.md and current quarter file (resources/plans/quarter-*.md); output alignment view: org pillars/OKRs vs PM quarter goals, optional gaps; no new file by default; optional save snapshot to resources/plans/archive/alignment-YYYY-Qn.md.
acceptanceCriteria: File exists at .cursor/skills/goals-alignment/SKILL.md
Contains When to Use and Workflow
Describes reading goals-strategy and quarter file, outputting alignment view
npm run typecheck and npm test pass

userStories.title: Create week-plan skill
userStories.description: Create .cursor/skills/week-plan/SKILL.md. When to Use: plan week, set weekly priorities. Workflow: read current quarter goals, last week file, projects/active, scratchpad/commitments; guide PM to top 3-5 week outcomes with quarter goal links (e.g. Advances Q1-2); write resources/plans/week-YYYY-Www.md; include commitments due and carried over. Reference PRD outputs for structure.
acceptanceCriteria: File exists at .cursor/skills/week-plan/SKILL.md
Contains When to Use and Workflow
References quarter goals and week file output with quarter links
npm run typecheck and npm test pass

userStories.title: Create week-review skill
userStories.description: Create .cursor/skills/week-review/SKILL.md. When to Use: review week, close week. Workflow: read current week file and quarter file; mark priorities done/partial/carried; brief quarter goal progress; optional one paragraph to memory/summaries/sessions.md or in week file.
acceptanceCriteria: File exists at .cursor/skills/week-review/SKILL.md
Contains When to Use and Workflow
Describes completion vs priorities, carry-over, quarter progress
npm run typecheck and npm test pass
